articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Gift Nifty, Asian markets to other global cues: Check out key triggers | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Asian markets mixed as Japan and South Korea decline, Australian markets fluctuate ahead of rate decision. US stocks end higher led by Tesla and bank shares. Crude oil prices steady, gold prices ease.
articles.content: Asian markets traded mixed on Tuesday following marginal overnight gains in equities on Wall Street ahead of the Independence Day holiday. Shares in Japan declined, while those in South Korea traded … [+2939 chars]

articles.author: Ashutosh Joshi, Ishika Mookerjee
articles.title: A $7.5 Billion Derivative Trade Shifts to India as SGX Feud Ends - Bloomberg
articles.description: Derivative contracts with a notional value of about $7.5 billion traded in Singapore will shift to India as a cross-border trading link between the two Asian countries’ top bourses gets fully operational on Monday.
